I eat here often. The food is for me the best asian food in Lund. The service is nice and always with a smile. Lunchtime there are 3 or 4 choices. After that you can order from the menu. Absolutely worth a visit !
We have visit the restaurant several times over the past 10 years and keep coming back. Great selection of food both vegetarian & meat. Lovely soups and noodle dishes always served with a smile!
Classic Thai food. Large portions and very tasty. Visited for lunch on a Saturday. It is a spacious place. Service could improve though!

Place was nice, food and waitresses were good. Price was little higher than expected for a ordinary dinner but i would go back again.
Good food and nice ambiance but rather spicy food. The table are far apart enough to enable a serious conversation.

We went there hoping to find the usual flavours of asian cuisine but we got really impresed with the quality and quantity of the dishes! The fried duck with rice, coconut milk and curry is awesome! The price is really nice aswell!
